title: A DUAL SCREEN Smart Phone?! - Durability Test
description: The Axon M was released last year, but was pretty low key due to the exclusivity with AT&T.  But Now ZTE's dual screened smartphone has found its way to my desk, and its time for a durability test. The dual screen concept is actually pretty interesting on a smartphone. I have always used dual screens on my computer setup, so why not include a second smartphone display!?  What do you think? Would you ever buy a dual screen smartphone? What would you change to make it more practical?
